name: Hyperinflation Havoc
title: Skyrocketing Inflation Rates
description: In 2016, Venezuela experienced an inflation rate of 254.95%, one of the highest globally, coupled with a wholesale price index reaching 4005.10, indicating severe economic instability.

name: Education Marathon
title: Longest Compulsory Education Duration
description: As of 2023, Venezuela mandates 17 years of compulsory education, one of the longest durations worldwide, showcasing a commitment to prolonged educational engagement.

name: Military Spending Paradox
title: Discrepancy in Military Expenditure
description: In 2023, Venezuela's military expenditure in local currency was exceptionally high at 1.09e+22, yet in USD, it was one of the lowest at $3,917,057, highlighting currency valuation issues.

name: Rule of Law Struggles
title: Low Rule of Law Percentile Rank
description: Venezuela's rule of law percentile rank was at a low 0.47 in 2023, indicating challenges in governance and legal frameworks.

name: Education Budget Crunch
title: Minimal Government Spending on Education
description: In 2023, only 0.92% of government expenditure was allocated to education, reflecting a significant underinvestment in the sector.

name: Currency Conundrum
title: High Real Effective Exchange Rate
description: Venezuela's real effective exchange rate index was 741.70 in 2016, indicating a strong currency valuation against a basket of currencies, despite domestic economic challenges.
